column5: Having done a lot of fishing the past week, the body's a little tired. The larder is also looking a little bare. So took some time to do some very necessary bread making. The oatmeal loaves will be great with a thick bowl of soup or stew.  Livin is good.
Whats in the bowl Bruce? Apple crisp ?
Once the others here get wind of that it will be gone in 2 hours
